Title: Helen's Marriage
Actors: Mabel Normand, Edward Dillon, Frank Opperman
Plot: Helen and Tom try to elope, but papa catches them and drives Tom away with a gun. At first Tom's friends at the club give him the laugh, but next day when he tells them of a plan, which was suggested by seeing a motion picture company at work, they consent to help him, bringing his scheme to a successful finish.
